feed.title: Public Architecture And Design Research Institute
feed.subtitle: PADRI was organized to support the research initiatives of Wenzhou-Kean University WKU, Michael Graves College MGC faculty and students.

entry.title: 2021 Conference
entry.content:
We recently completed The Public Architecture and Design Research Institute’s (PADRI) inaugural conference and exhibition coinciding with, and part of the Thinking Creatively Conference! PADRI was organized to support the research initiatives of Wenzhou-Kean University (WKU), Michael Graves College (MGC) faculty and students. This year’s conference and exhibition featured projects from every department in the college, including Graphic Design, Interior Design, Industrial Design, and Architecture.

We had a student team who developed a logo design for the Institute and a faculty member selected for best research project.
